1.0.0.name: wordpress/wphotfiles
1.0.0.description:
Hot Files is a File Sharing and Document Management plugin for your WordPress Site. Hot Files plugin will help you to share any files publicly or with password protection from your site. It also will help you to manage, track and control shared file downloads from your wordpress site.

Features

  • Custom Post Type
  • Unlimited file sharing from same post
  • Drag and Drop File Upload
  • Password protection
  • Download Counter
